title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 403.5 - Public comment and complaints
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 403.5 - Public comment and complaints

State Regulations
(a) Public comment. In order to assure public participation, recipients of
services or their representatives and the public shall have an opportunity to
present comments about the social services program and the planning process
either orally or in writing throughout the program year. Social services
districts shall establish procedures for recording and processing such
comment. (b) Complaints. Applicants for or recipients of services, or their
representatives, shall have an opportunity to present complaints, either orally
or in writing, to the social services district in accordance with Part 356 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18

403.5

Amended

New

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
